Container.Name: Google-MusicManager
Container.Description: Allows uploading of local music files for use with the Google Play Music service.[br][br] All credit to ruippeixotog.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/appdata[/b] The working directory of Google Music Manager, where application logs and internal database files are stored.[br][br] [b]/music[/b] The music directory that should be synchronized with Google Play Music. [br][br] [b]5900[/b] is the port exposed by the VNC server. Map a different port number as to not conflict with any existing VMs.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Instructions[/span][/u][/b][br] 1.Open your VNC viewer of choice and connect to the mapped port that you specificed during the install.[br] 2.Once connected, sign in with your Google Credentials to complete the setup of Music Manager.
